Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-40777 affecting package bind for versions less than 9.20.15-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-40777 affecting package bind for versions less than 9.20.15-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package bind is earlier than 9.20.15-1, affected by CVE-2025-40777
